about.heading: What do I do?
paragraphs: I build products from idea to production, working closely with product owners, designers, and backend teams. I prioritize reusability, design clean component systems, and optimize the software development lifecycle.
My approach combines product thinking and technical excellence: always asking 'why' before 'how', while pursuing a clear, maintainable, and easy-to-handover codebase.
